DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare learn mechanisms increase vegetable acceptance infant complementary feeding , namely repeat exposure ( RE ) , flavor-flavor learning ( FFL ) flavor-nutrient learning ( FNL ) ; measure stability learn effect ; examine impact infant ' feed history vegetable acceptance .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effect Repeated Exposure , Flavor-Flavor Flavor-Nutrient Learning Vegetable Acceptance Infants
DOC.criteria: Healthy infant , age 4 8 month old , yet introduce complementary food Infants food allergy , chronic health problem , bear 36 week gestational age
